channel.title: Lucene on Guoqing Geng
channel.description: Recent content in Lucene on Guoqing Geng

item.title: Document in Lucene
item.description: In Lucene, a Document is the unit of search and index. An index consists of a sequence of documents. A document contains of one or more Fields. A field is a named sequence of terms. A term is a string. In order to index data with Lucene, you must convert it to a stream of plain-text tokens firstly. Based on the stream, the document containning fields will be created.
